Version 0.3.2
Voyager New Moves
Name Type Category PP Power Accuracy Description
Absorb 25 30 100 An attack that absorbs half the damage inflicted.
Astonish 15 40 100 An attack that may shock the foe into flinching.
Brutal Swing 20 90 100 Violently swings around to hurt everyone nearby.
Crabhammer 10 100 90 Hammers with a pincer. Has a high critical-hit ratio.
Dizzy Punch 10 70 100 A rhythmic punch that may confuse the foe.
Hail 10 0 Summons a hailstorm that strikes every turn.
Heat Wave 10 100 90 Exhales a hot breath on the foe. May inflict a burn.
Magma Storm 5 100 75 Traps the foe in a vortex of fire for 2 to 5 turns.
Mega Drain 15 55 100 An attack that absorbs half the damage inflicted.
Moonlight 5 0 Restores HP. The amount varies with the weather.
Morning Sun 5 0 Restores HP. The amount varies with the weather.
Nightmare 15 100 Inflicts 1/4 damage on a sleeping foe every turn.
Razor Wind 10 70 100 Cuts the target with air. Has a high critical-hit ratio.
Scorching Sands 10 70 100 Throws scorching sand at the target. May leave a burn.
Skull Bash 10 130 100 Tucks in the head, then attacks on the next turn.
Solar Beam 10 120 100 Absorbs light in one turn, then attacks next turn.
Submission 20 120 100 A reckless body slam that also hurts the user.
Synthesis 5 0 Restores HP. The amount varies with the weather.
Thunder 10 110 70 A lightning attack that may cause paralysis.
Withdraw 20 0 Withdraws the body into its hard shell to raise Defense and Sp. Def.
